summary: Building a dashboard application similar to the reference at ai.studio/apps/a97f3825-5282-4ea0-bd66-c18737521df6

existing_features.title: Transform the CommandCenter page to match the layout and visual style of the reference application at https://ai.studio/apps/a97f3825-5282-4ea0-bd66-c18737521df6, including grid structure, card arrangements, and spacing
Update color scheme and visual theming to match the reference application's aesthetic, including card backgrounds, text colors, accent colors, and overall color palette

Redesign or replace existing dashboard cards (KPIMetricsRow, NeuralIngestInput, SynopsisEngineCard, SpectralAnalysisCard) to match the content structure and visual presentation of equivalent cards in the reference application
Update the DashboardLayout sidebar navigation to match the reference application's navigation structure, including menu items, icons, and visual styling
Adjust responsive behavior and mobile layout to match how the reference application handles different screen sizes and breakpoints

new_feature_requests.summary: Create dashboard similar to reference application
